scenario_text.value: Hold up, Kaito!
What do you want?

No one’s trying to hurt you here, Kaito. We
get how you feel, all too well.

It goes without saying... Everyone’s sad
about losing Miu.
...Shut up.

It’s just like with Ryo and Shuuji. We’re all
sad, but that’s why we have to—

Shut your freaking face! If it hadn’t been
for you guys...

If all of you had taken that fight seriously,
you wouldn’t have gotten separated like that!

Miyuki this, stragglers that, blah blah blah!
It’s because of all that crap that Miu...

That kind, weak Miu ended up in the enemy’s
crosshairs!
That’s not fair, man...

Isn’t it? You should’ve known the weak never
last long! I could’ve told you as much!

That’s why I needed to be strong. I needed to
protect her.
But I failed. If only I’d been stronger!

(Sounds like he blames himself as much as he
blames us.)

(If we’d worked as a team, would we have been
able to save Miu?)

(Is Kaito really that far off the mark? Or is
it actually our fault?)
(Kaito is...)
Just venting.
Totally right.
Missing the point.

I’m sorry, Kaito, but all I can see is you
venting, here.
...You wanna say that again?
I can tell how much it hurts to lose Miu.

But everyone did everything in their power
back here.

No one’s to blame here. I think even you
understand that.
Owww!
Shaddup! Shaddup, shaddup, SHADDAAAP!
You might be right, Kaito.

Maybe this wouldn’t have happened if we had
worked together more.

But that’s all the more reason we need to
come together right now! Don’t you see that?!
Shut your mouth!
Don’t you dare...treat Miu like a memory!
Kaito...
Now’s not the time for this.

What if, woulda-coulda-shoulda. None of that
talk is gonna bring Miu back...
SHADDUP!
Kaito...

There must’ve been more we could’ve done for
her. Ain’t that right?!

That applies to you as much as it does to me.
Don’t just try and wash your hands of it!

Why did Miu, of all people, have to suffer
for all of this?

If none of us are to blame, and she’s not to
blame, then why’s she the one that had to go?

You can’t just brush this off with some empty
words! I bet you don’t even care!
That’s not true, Kaito.
Dracumon...
You followed us here? Useless idiot.
Whoa, Kaito! That’s not cool at all!

It is what it is. I couldn’t protect what was
most important to him.

Kaito, I get that you can’t accept any of
this. But that’s the only way to move on.
Miu’s gone.
Shut up... Just leave me alone!
Kaito! Where are you going?!
Hold up, Takuma. You should leave him alone.

He’s in no mood to listen to anything you got
to say.
Dracumon...

He’ll be back as soon as he’s cooled his
head. I’ll keep an eye on him.
Yeah...okay, then.

You should help Agumon out back there, all
right?
Agumon? Is something wrong with him?

You kidding? You hear him hollering back
there with those kids? I pity the guy.

(Oh. That’s right. Those kids Jijimon was
looking after when we escaped the castle.)

(Agumon’s been taking care of them since
we’re all down in the dumps.)

Well it looks like everyone else is pitching
in, too.

Agumon’s been going on all cylinders, so you
should give him a break.
Good point. Thanks, Dracumon.
Yeah, yeah. Peace out.

(I really hope Kaito can manage to turn
things around.)
